name: machine-core
description: Types and utitilities for behavioural typechecking for @actyx/machine-runner machines

scripts.build:rs: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release && cpy pkg lib
scripts.build:ts: npm run build:ts:esm && npm run build:ts:cjs
scripts.build:ts:esm: tsc --build tsconfig.esm.json && cpy package.esm.json lib/esm --rename package.json
scripts.build:ts:cjs: tsc --build tsconfig.cjs.json && cpy package.cjs.json lib/cjs --rename package.json
scripts.build: npm run build:rs && npm run build:ts
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build && rimraf lib/pkg/.gitignore
scripts.test: npm run test:esm && npm run test:cjs
